name: Samara's Head
description:
Samara's Head An interactive novel and life simulation of a young woman doing ordinary things in extraordinary ways

You are about to experience a day in Samara Jones' life. She has a very special interpretation of 'control' which keeps her from having a common daily routine. Hopefully, she will get everything neccessary done at home so that she can leave the house for a walk.

Prepare to face unusual challenges and maybe to not succeed in every aspect of daily life.

This game broaches the issue of living  with OCD (obsessive-compulsive disorder). Viewing obsessive thoughts and compulsive actions from the perspective of a game might be disturbing for people suffering from this or similar diseases.
